Ingredients.3: 2 tablespoons butter, cut into small pieces

Directions.1: Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat.

Directions.2: Place radishes on a sheet of foil. Sprinkle lemon pepper seasoning over the radishes and scatter butter over the top. Seal the foil into a packet.

Directions.3: Place packet on the grill and cook for 10 minutes. Shake packet and grill until radishes are tender, about 8 more minutes.
